title: Metal Chelation as an Antibacterial Strategy for Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Acinetobacter baumannii

It is estimated that by 2050, bacterial infections will cause 1.8 million more deaths than cancer annually, and the current lack of antibiotic drug discovery is only exacerbating the crisis....
